title: Previewing ‘Narcos: Mexico’ With Executive Producer Eric Newman | The Watch (Ep. 307)
description:
A24 is partnering with Apple to produce a slate of movies for the tech giant (1:07). ‘Narcos’ executive producer Eric Newman previews ‘Narcos: Mexico’ (22:34) and talks about portraying the drug war on screen (45:47).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Eric Newman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
